ygData.subject: Warrior Upgrade-the real deal !! *READ*
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail to tee! I am a human warrior of the 20th level.  Read this and you ll know everthing that is going on.  I ve don some mathimatical calculations. FAQ: Q.
ygData.messageBody:
Hail to tee!
I am a human warrior of the 20th level. Read this and you'll know everthing
that is going on. I've don some mathimatical calculations.

FAQ:
Q. Whats going on?
A. They upgraded the warrior. We get a Critical Hit attack, SV Magic boost
(and probably others),an HP "buff" and I've found that I am hitting alot
harder, quicker and more damage then before.

_____________________________________________________________________

Now, I've done some calculating with some math operation I've learned in
calculess last year.
If you Duel weild on faster weapons, IE. anything dealy:30 and down you'll
score more critical hits. I've found that on average from every 2-5 battle
I can dish about 2 critical hits. When I ahd my 1st critical hit, it was
for 18 points of damage and it's rising, currently I see that I am hitting
for 32 points. I have noticed that it's not going up any more. So my
hypothisis is that every level your CH goes up 2 poitns everytime it does it
and MAX's out of 10 points per level.

I current duel weild a PGT (right) and a combine Long Sword (left). I have
noticed with an ratio of 6/26 - 6/28 my average hits per 5 seconds is a
ratio of dmg to dealy- 46/47 (including double attacks/duel weilds) that
stat can be calculated to 1 weapon witch would be a 2.304 on the weapon
dmg:dealy ricter scale.

Has anyone noticed the speed, we're hitting alot harder and alot faster then
before. before I think my hp was 600 at lvl 20 and I've noticed that it's
603 with no buffs.

If someone could get to the guild soon and see what they cahnged that wiuld
be great, couse currently I am zoned in Unrest.

Your best bet would switch to 1h slashing couse if you look at the table
below.. you'll seee what I mean on your chances to CH.


Delay: CH %
_______________________
50 3.45%
45 6.63%
40 8.39%
35 9.92%
30 12.00%
25 15.65%
20 23.003%

As you can see (done by: delay/60[move the . of 2 the the left]) would give
your %. Lower the delay and more hits per weapon, moer CH your going to get
in. so for an average of 1-4CH per battle you you weild 2 weapon of a deal
of 30 and down and a skill over 90 at the lvl of 20.

=P thnc for reading, hope you understand!!!

Dealan Strongbear <Combine> - Rainkeeper - Karana Server
